pli-tv-pvr9:1.1: Dasa atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr9:1.2: saṃghasuṭṭhutāya, saṃghaphāsutāya, dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, appasannānaṃ pasādāya, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā vinayānuggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.2: Yaṃ saṃghaphāsu taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.3: Yaṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.4: Yaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.5: Yaṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.6: Yaṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya taṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.7: Yaṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya taṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.2: Yaṃ saṃghasuṭṭhu taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.3: Yaṃ saṃghasuṭṭhu taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.4: Yaṃ saṃghasuṭṭhu taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.5: Yaṃ saṃghasuṭṭhu taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.1: Yaṃ saṃghaphāsu taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.2: Yaṃ saṃghaphāsu taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.3: Yaṃ saṃghaphāsu taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.4: Yaṃ saṃghaphāsu taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:5.10: Yaṃ vinayānuggahāya taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:5.11: Yaṃ vinayānuggahāya taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:5.12: Yaṃ vinayānuggahāya taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya.
pli-tv-pvr9:5.13: Yaṃ vinayānuggahāya taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya.
